name: CreateMenu
notes:
This function merely CREATES the menu - ShowMenuForPlayer must be used to show it.
 You can only create and access 2 columns (0 & 1).
 If the title's length is equal to or greater than 32 chars the title is truncated to 30 characters.
warnings: There is a limit of 12 items per menu, and a limit of 128 menus in total.

params_body.name: title[]
params_body.description: The title for the new menu.

params_body.name: columns
params_body.description: How many colums shall the new menu have.

params_body.name: Float:x
params_body.description: The X position of the menu (640x460 canvas - 0 would put the menu at the far left).

params_body.name: Float:y
params_body.description: The Y position of the menu (640x460 canvas - 0 would put the menu at the far top).

params_body.name: Float:col1width
params_body.description: The width for the first column.

params_body.name: Float:col2width
params_body.description: The width for the second column.

return_values: The ID of the new menu or -1 on failure.
related_fn:
AddMenuItem: Add an item to a menu.
 SetMenuColumnHeader: Set the header for one of the columns in a menu.
 DestroyMenu: Destroy a menu.
 ShowMenuForPlayer: Show a menu for a player.
 HideMenuForPlayer: Hide a menu for a player.
 OnPlayerSelectedMenuRow: Called when a player selected a row in a menu.
 OnPlayerExitedMenu: Called when a player exits a menu.
